verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat, In the first לְדָרְיָ֛וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> le-da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲחַשְׁוֵר֖וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> a-chash-ve-Roosh of Ahasuerus מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> miz-Ze-ra' of the seed מָדָ֑י <S%H4074><s%> ma-Dai; of the Medes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הָמְלַ֔ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ha-me-Lach, which was made king עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over מַלְכ֥וּת <S%H4438><s%> mal-Chut over the realm כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <S%H3778><s%> kas-Dim. of the Chaldeans

בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat In the first לְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> le-ma-le-Cho, of his reign אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I דָּֽנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel, I Daniel בִּינֹ֖תִי <S%H995><s%> bi-No-ti understood בַּסְּפָרִ֑ים <S%H5612><s%> bas-se-fa-Rim; by books מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par the number הַשָּׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nim, of the years אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah was דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- whereof the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמִיָ֣ה <S%H3414><s%> yir-mi-Yah came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi, the prophet לְמַלֹּ֛אות <S%H4390><s%> le-mal-Lot that he would accomplish לְחָרְב֥וֹת <S%H2723><s%> le-cha-re-Vot in the desolations יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im seventy שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. years

וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-te-Nah And I set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai, my face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai unto the Lord הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, God לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> le-vak-Kesh to seek תְּפִלָּ֖ה <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-Lah by prayer וְתַחֲנוּנִ֑ים <S%H8469><s%> ve-ta-cha-nu-Nim; and supplications בְּצ֖וֹם <S%H6685><s%> be-Tzom with fasting וְשַׂ֥ק <S%H8242><s%> ve-Sak and sackcloth וָאֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H665><s%> va-'E-fer. and ashes

וָֽאֶתְפַּֽלְלָ֛ה <S%H6419><s%> va-'et-pal-Lah And I prayed לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai my God וָאֶתְוַדֶּ֑ה <S%H3034><s%> va-'et-vad-Deh; and made my confession וָאֹֽמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> va-'o-me-Rah, and said אָנָּ֤א <S%H577><s%> 'an-Na O אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Lord הָאֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> ha-'El God הַגָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-dOl the great וְהַנּוֹרָ֔א <S%H3372><s%> ve-han-no-Ra, and dreadful שֹׁמֵ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer keeping הַבְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit the covenant וְֽהַחֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> ve-ha-Che-sed, and mercy לְאֹהֲבָ֖יו <S%H157><s%> le-'o-ha-Vav to them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> u-le-sho-me-Rei him and to them that keep מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav. his commandments

חָטָ֥אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu We have sinned וְעָוִ֖ינוּ <S%H5753><s%> ve-'a-Vi-nu and have committed iniquity; וְהִרְשַׁעְנוּ ve-hir-sha'-nu כהִרְשַׁ֣עְנוּ <S%H7561><s%> hir-Sha'-nu condemn קוּמָרָ֑דְנוּ <S%H4775><s%> u-ma-Ra-de-nu; and have rebelled וְס֥וֹר <S%H5493><s%> ve-Sor even by departing מִמִּצְוֹתֶ֖ךָ <S%H4687><s%> mi-mitz-vo-Te-cha from thy precepts וּמִמִּשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4941><s%> u-mi-mish-pa-Tei-cha. and from thy judgments

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not שָׁמַ֙עְנוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-nu Neither have we hearkened אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha unto thy servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im, the prophets אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who דִּבְּרוּ֙ <S%H1696><s%> dib-be-Ru which spake בְּשִׁמְךָ֔ <S%H8034><s%> be-shim-Cha, in thy name אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מְלָכֵ֥ינוּ <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chei-nu to our kings שָׂרֵ֖ינוּ <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei-nu our princes וַאֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> va-'a-vo-Tei-nu; and our fathers וְאֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> ve-'El and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am and to all the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the land

לְךָ֤ le-Cha אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai O Lord הַצְּדָקָ֔ה <S%H6666><s%> hatz-tze-da-Kah, righteousness וְלָ֛נוּ ve-La-nu בֹּ֥שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> Bo-shet [belongeth] unto thee but unto us confusion הַפָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> hap-pa-Nim of faces כַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> kai-Yom as at this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; is this לְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish to the men יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וּלְיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> u-le-yo-she-Vei and to the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֞ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El and unto all Israel הַקְּרֹבִ֣ים <S%H7138><s%> hak-ke-ro-Vim [that are] near וְהָרְחֹקִ֗ים <S%H7350><s%> ve-ha-re-cho-Kim, and [that are] far off בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הָֽאֲרָצוֹת֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-ra-tzOt through all the countries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to which הִדַּחְתָּ֣ם <S%H5080><s%> hid-dach-Tam whither thou hast driven שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, because בְּמַעֲלָ֖ם <S%H4604><s%> be-ma-'a-Lam them because of their trespass אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מָֽעֲלוּ־ <S%H4603><s%> ma-'a-lu- that they have trespassed בָֽךְ׃ <S%H99999><s%> Vach.

יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Lord לָ֚נוּ La-nu בֹּ֣שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> Bo-shet to us [belongeth] confusion הַפָּנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> hap-pa-Nim, of face לִמְלָכֵ֥ינוּ <S%H4428><s%> lim-la-Chei-nu to our kings לְשָׂרֵ֖ינוּ <S%H8269><s%> le-sa-Rei-nu to our princes וְלַאֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> ve-la-'a-vo-Tei-nu; and to our fathers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher because חָטָ֖אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu because we have sinned לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

לַֽאדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> la-do-Nai To the Lord אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God הָרַחֲמִ֖ים <S%H7356><s%> ha-ra-cha-Mim [belong] mercies וְהַסְּלִח֑וֹת <S%H5547><s%> ve-has-se-li-Chot; and forgivenesses כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מָרַ֖דְנוּ <S%H4775><s%> ma-Rad-nu though we have rebelled בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor שָׁמַ֔עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-nu, Neither have we obeyed בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God לָלֶ֤כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to walk בְּתֽוֹרֹתָיו֙ <S%H8451><s%> be-to-ro-Tav in his laws אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan which he set לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-nu, before בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad us by עֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav his servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im. the prophets

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Yea all Israel עָֽבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-ve-Ru have transgressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תּ֣וֹרָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H8451><s%> to-ra-Te-cha, thy law וְס֕וֹר <S%H5493><s%> ve-Sor even by departing לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not שְׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> she-Mo-a' that they might not obey בְּקֹלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Le-cha; thy voice וַתִּתַּ֨ךְ <S%H5413><s%> vat-tit-Tach is poured עָלֵ֜ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu so הָאָלָ֣ה <S%H423><s%> ha-'a-Lah therefore the curse וְהַשְּׁבֻעָ֗ה <S%H7621><s%> ve-hash-she-vu-'Ah, upon us and the oath אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which כְּתוּבָה֙ <S%H3789><s%> ke-tu-Vah that [is] written בְּתוֹרַת֙ <S%H8451><s%> be-to-Rat in the law מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh of Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> 'e-ved- the servant הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for חָטָ֖אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu because we have sinned לֽוֹ׃ <S%H99999><s%> lo.

וַיָּ֜קֶם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kem And he hath confirmed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ; דְּבָרָיו de-va-rav כדְּבָרֹ֣ו <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ro act קאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber which he spake עָלֵ֗ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu, against וְעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and against שֹֽׁפְטֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H8199><s%> sho-fe-Tei-nu against us and against our judges אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who שְׁפָט֔וּנוּ <S%H8199><s%> she-fa-Tu-nu, that judged לְהָבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi us by bringing עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu and against רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah evil גְדֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah; upon us a great אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- has not נֶעֶשְׂתָ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> ne-'es-Tah, hath not been done תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, for under the whole heaven כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher who נֶעֶשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ne-'es-Tah as hath been done בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. upon Jerusalem

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher it כָּתוּב֙ <S%H3789><s%> ka-Tuv As [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> be-to-Rat in the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, of Moses אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah all this evil הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise בָּ֣אָה <S%H935><s%> Ba-'ah is come עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu; and וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- have not חִלִּ֜ינוּ <S%H2470><s%> chil-Li-nu upon us yet made we not our prayer אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for פְּנֵ֣י׀ <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God לָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv that we might turn מֵֽעֲוֹנֵ֔נוּ <S%H5771><s%> me-'a-vo-Ne-nu, from our iniquities וּלְהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <S%H7919><s%> u-le-has-Kil and understand בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> ba-'a-mit-Te-cha. thy truth

וַיִּשְׁקֹ֤ד <S%H8245><s%> vai-yish-Kod watched יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Therefore hath the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- respect הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah, upon the evil וַיְבִיאֶ֖הָ <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'E-ha and brought עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu; respect כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for צַדִּ֞יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik [is] righteous יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh it upon us for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- respect כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- to all מַֽעֲשָׂיו֙ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sav in all his works אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, which he doeth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-nu for we obeyed בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Lo. not his voice

וְעַתָּ֣ה׀ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah and now אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai And now O Lord אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הוֹצֵ֨אתָ <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tze-ta forth אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמְּךָ֜ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha thy people מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> cha-za-Kah, with a mighty וַתַּֽעַשׂ־ <S%H6213><s%> vat-ta-'as- and hast gotten לְךָ֥ le-Cha שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> shem thee renown כַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> kai-Yom as at this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; is this חָטָ֖אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu we have sinned רָשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <S%H7561><s%> ra-Sha-'e-nu. we have done wickedly
